q: of one sun god, Aton. The bust is at the top of a "wish list" of five major artefacts exhibited abroad that Egypt wants returned as part of its cultural heritage. Egypt recognises and appreciates the care and effort undertaken by the government of Germany to preserve and display the painted limestone bust of Queen Nefertiti, Zahi Hawass said in a statement. But he asked that "this unique treasure be returned to the possession of its rightful owners, the Egyptian people." Article: Egypt asks Berlin to return Nefertiti

Dozens of fans greeted the 11-time All-Star at Ataturk Airport. Salmon , a Republican who switched from the Democratic Party in 2009, confirmed Tuesday that he is considering running for the U.S. Senate next year against independent incumbent Sen. Bernie Sanders . We're in the very early stages, said Thomas P. Salmon of St. Johnsbury, who has alluded to challenging Sen. Bernie Sanders in Facebook messages and elsewhere. " Future Potential Google Inc. 's Eric Schmidt said in a separate interview at the World Economic Forum that the high value attributed to some young companies is on par with their future potential. The e-commerce space feels overheated because valuations are based on long-term revenue expectations, said Eric Schmidt , who plans to step down from his role as CEO and become executive chairman in April. "Outside of the music industry, no one in the United States knew who Simon Cowell was until he started making nasty comments during the first season promotions for the show," he says. Being mean was what made him a celebrity. But Steven Tyler and Jennifer Lopez are already celebrities. They have their cultural equity to protect. a nationwide panel of 50 media members who regularly cover the league. Michael Vick received 29 1/2 votes, easily beating Seahawks receiver Mike Williams, who got eight.
